attributes.action: Baroness Warsi should resign as MP
attributes.additional_details:
Sayeeda Warsi, who resigned over the UK government's Gaza policy this past summer, strikes again, flocking to twitter to draw a parallel between terrorists and Israelis visiting the Temple Mount

"Israeli extremists storm Al Aqsa & intimidate worshippers. Palestinian extremists storm synagogue & kill 4 worshippers #Tragic  #peacenotwar" 8:38 AM - 18 Nov 2014

Grant Shapps MP        ✔ @grantshapps
To be clear @SayeedaWarsi speaks for herself, not the party. Our prayers are w/ families of those murdered. No justification for terrorism.

Baroness Warsi should not be allowed the honour and respect of working as an MP in Britain. If you agree SIGN THE PETITION

rejection.details: This is not a matter for the Government
